A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Definitely not the worst Star Wars movie! It was very different from the previous movies but I feel like it went in a good direction- really\, it went in the only direction this series could possibly go after everything that's happened. The ONLY downside\, and the reason I had to knock off a star\, is that the plot of Finn\, Poe\, and Rose didn't seem very important. It brought us a good message at the end but other than that I would've rather seen more of the Luke\, Rey\, and Kylo Ren plot- or just had a 2-hour movie instead of 2 and a half hours. Can't wait to see where this goes in episode IX!
